issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Description:
After running the tests at Phone>Orientation>, the Nav bar in the next table view is rendered smaller than required. On iPod, there are two navbar sizes, one for landscape, one for portrait. It looks like the application in in such a state that the smaller navbar is rendered. This is rectified by rotating the device.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS 1.8.0 on iPod 3rd gen.
2) Navigate to Phone>Orientation
3) Tap "set portrait" button
4) go back
5) Tap "Contacts" to view test list
6) Examine the nav bar

Result:
The nav bar is smaller than the normal portrait navbar, making the top row in the tableview look large

Expected result:
Portrait-sized navbar

Notes:
Occurs with 1.7.2 as well
fields.summary: Kitchensink: landscape-sized Nav bar is rendered on Phone>Contacts> test menu if Phone>Orientation> test run prior
fields.environment: SDK 1.8.0.v20110819142548 on iPod 3rd Gen 4.0.2, Titanium Studio, build: 1.0.4.201108101535
